Name: ERO Girl Painter
About the game: game introduction ERO Girl Painter is a game that simulates painting. Through the process of line drawing, coloring, and revising, you can easily experience the fun of completing the drawing yourself. Game Features · Experience the fun of drawing manuscript by hand · Finish the manuscript according to the instruction line · Fast color on manuscript · Slide the key parts to modify the finished manuscript · 10 beautiful manuscripts
